title: Darkstream: a place for pagans
author: VD
content_html: I wanted to give some encouragement to the pagans in tonight’s Darkstream. Just because Christianity is necessary for the West doesn’t mean there is no place for them in defending it.
content_text:
I wanted to give some encouragement to the pagans in tonight’s Darkstream. Just because Christianity is necessary for the West doesn’t mean there is no place for them
in defending it
.
